```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(readxl)
library(gapminder)

```



```{r}
industry = read_csv("industry/industry.csv")

states = read_csv("states.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = industry, aes(x = Males, y = Industry, text = paste("Males: ",
                         "<br>Earning: $", Males,
                         "<br>Industry: $", Industry))) + 
      geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill='navajowhite') + theme_classic()

```
